ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities in the ppy/osu repository include several pull requests focusing on bug fixes and improvements, such as addressing issues with slider end drag markers, quick-deleting unselected slider path control points, and fixing volume adjust key repeat functionality. Additionally, there have been efforts to refactor score-independent bonuses into star rating and enhancements to the overall user experience. These contributions demonstrate the community's ongoing efforts to maintain and enhance the osu! project.
